mapper.select:
select CASE WHEN GROUPING(month(t.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME) ) = 1 THEN 13 else month(t.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME) end month , sum((CASE WHEN (t.MORT_TYPE='30016001' or t.MORT_TYPE='30016002') THEN t.MORT_COM_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END)) mortComAmount, -- 商贷金额 sum((CASE WHEN (t.MORT_TYPE='30016003' or t.MORT_TYPE='30016002') THEN t.MORT_PRF_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END)) mortPrfAmount --公积金金额 from sctrans.T_RPT_HISTORY_CASE_BASE_INFO t where t.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME is not null
and year(t.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME)= #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND t.belong_for_year =#{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} and MONTH(t.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME) = t.belong_for_month
or ( year(t.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME)= 2017 and MONTH(t.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME)=01 )
group by month(t.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME) WITH ROLLUP order by month(t.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME) asc

select CASE WHEN GROUPING(month(t.MORT_SIGN_DATE) ) = 1 THEN 13 else month(t.MORT_SIGN_DATE) end month , sum((CASE WHEN (t.MORT_TYPE='30016001' or t.MORT_TYPE='30016002') THEN t.MORT_COM_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END)) dkmortComAmount, -- 商贷金额 sum((CASE WHEN (t.MORT_TYPE='30016003' or t.MORT_TYPE='30016002' ) THEN t.MORT_PRF_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END)) dkmortPrfAmount --公积金金额 from sctrans.T_RPT_HISTORY_CASE_BASE_INFO t where t.MORT_SIGN_DATE is not null and t.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI=1
and year(t.MORT_SIGN_DATE)= #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND t.belong_for_year =#{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} and MONTH(t.MORT_SIGN_DATE) = t.belong_for_month
or ( year(t.MORT_SIGN_DATE)= 2017 and MONTH(t.MORT_SIGN_DATE)=01 )
group by month(t.MORT_SIGN_DATE) WITH ROLLUP order by month(t.MORT_SIGN_DATE) asc

select CASE WHEN GROUPING(month(t.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME) ) = 1 THEN 13 else month(t.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME) end month , sum((CASE WHEN t.CASE_LOAN_REQ=0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) loanReqNum,--'无贷款单数' , sum((CASE WHEN t.MORT_TYPE='30016003' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) prfNum,-- '公积金单数', sum((CASE WHEN t.MORT_TYPE='30016001' or t.MORT_TYPE='30016002' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) comNum,-- '商贷单数', count(*) allNum,--'总单数', sum(t.CASE_REAL_PRICE) allRealPrice,--' 过户房价', sum((CASE WHEN t.MORT_TYPE='30016001' or t.MORT_TYPE='30016002' THEN t.MORT_COM_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END)) mortComAmount,-- ' 商贷金额', sum((CASE WHEN (t.MORT_TYPE='30016003' or t.MORT_TYPE='30016002' ) THEN t.MORT_PRF_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END)) mortPrfAmount,-- ' 公积金金额', sum((CASE WHEN t.MORT_TYPE='30016001' or t.MORT_TYPE='30016002' THEN t.CASE_CON_PRICE ELSE 0 END)) realPrice,-- '有商贷案件房价', sum((CASE WHEN (t.MORT_TYPE='30016001' or t.MORT_TYPE='30016002') and t.CASE_REC_STATUS=0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) comRec,-- '商贷收单（商贷）', sum((CASE WHEN (t.MORT_TYPE='30016001' or t.MORT_TYPE='30016002') and t.CASE_REC_STATUS=1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) lsRec,--'流失单数（商贷）', sum((CASE WHEN (t.MORT_TYPE='30016001' or t.MORT_TYPE='30016002') and t.CASE_REC_STATUS=0 THEN t.MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END)) sdAmount,-- '收单金额（商贷）', sum((CASE WHEN (t.MORT_TYPE='30016001' or t.MORT_TYPE='30016002') and t.CASE_REC_STATUS=1 THEN t.MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END)) lsAmount,--'流失金额（商贷）', sum((CASE WHEN (t.MORT_TYPE='30016001' or t.MORT_TYPE='30016002') THEN t.MORT_COM_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END)) Allcom --'商贷）' from sctrans.T_RPT_HISTORY_CASE_BASE_INFO t where 1=1
and year(t.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME)= #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND t.belong_for_year =#{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} and MONTH(t.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME) = t.belong_for_month
or ( year(t.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME)= 2017 and MONTH(t.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME)=01 )
group by month(t.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME) WITH ROLLUP

select CASE WHEN GROUPING(month(t.MORT_SIGN_DATE) ) = 1 THEN 13 else month(t.MORT_SIGN_DATE) end month , sum((CASE WHEN (t.MORT_TYPE='30016001' or t.MORT_TYPE='30016002') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) comSum,-- '商贷签约量', sum((CASE WHEN t.MORT_TYPE='30016003' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) prfSum,-- '公积金签约量', sum((CASE WHEN (t.MORT_TYPE='30016001' or t.MORT_TYPE='30016002') THEN t.MORT_COM_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END)) mortComAmount,-- ' 商贷金额', sum((CASE WHEN (t.MORT_TYPE='30016003' or t.MORT_TYPE='30016002') THEN t.MORT_PRF_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END)) mortPrfAmount,-- ' 公积金金额', sum(t.CASE_CON_PRICE) conPrice--' 案件合同价' from sctrans.T_RPT_HISTORY_CASE_BASE_INFO t where t.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI=1
and year(t.MORT_SIGN_DATE)= #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND t.belong_for_year =#{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} and MONTH(t.MORT_SIGN_DATE) = t.belong_for_month
or ( year(t.MORT_SIGN_DATE)= 2017 and MONTH(t.MORT_SIGN_DATE)=01 )
group by month(t.MORT_SIGN_DATE) WITH ROLLUP

select CASE WHEN GROUPING(month(t.CASE_DISPATCH_TIME) ) = 1 THEN 13 else month(t.CASE_DISPATCH_TIME) end month , count((CASE WHEN t.CASE_DISPATCH_TIME is not null THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) dispatchSum--'派单量' , from sctrans.T_RPT_HISTORY_CASE_BASE_INFO t where 1=1
and year(t.CASE_DISPATCH_TIME)= #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND t.belong_for_year =#{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} and MONTH(t.CASE_DISPATCH_TIME) = t.belong_for_month
or ( year(t.CASE_DISPATCH_TIME)= 2017 and MONTH(t.CASE_DISPATCH_TIME)=01 )
group by month(t.CASE_DISPATCH_TIME) WITH ROLLUP

select CASE WHEN GROUPING(month(t.CASE_REAL_CON_TIME) ) = 1 THEN 13 else month(t.CASE_REAL_CON_TIME) end month , count((CASE WHEN t.CASE_REAL_CON_TIME is not null THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) realConSum-- '签约量（买卖）', from sctrans.T_RPT_HISTORY_CASE_BASE_INFO t where 1=1
and year(t.CASE_REAL_CON_TIME)= #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND t.belong_for_year =#{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} and MONTH(t.CASE_REAL_CON_TIME) = t.belong_for_month
or ( year(t.CASE_REAL_CON_TIME)= 2017 and MONTH(t.CASE_REAL_CON_TIME)=01 )
group by month(t.CASE_REAL_CON_TIME) WITH ROLLUP

select CASE WHEN GROUPING(month(t.TRANSFER_REAL_HT_TIME) ) = 1 THEN 13 else month(t.TRANSFER_REAL_HT_TIME) end month , count((CASE WHEN t.TRANSFER_REAL_HT_TIME is not null THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) transferAppPassSum-- '过户量', from sctrans.T_RPT_HISTORY_CASE_BASE_INFO t where 1=1
and year(t.TRANSFER_REAL_HT_TIME)= #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND t.belong_for_year =#{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} and MONTH(t.TRANSFER_REAL_HT_TIME) = t.belong_for_month
or ( year(t.TRANSFER_REAL_HT_TIME)= 2017 and MONTH(t.TRANSFER_REAL_HT_TIME)=01 )
group by month(t.TRANSFER_REAL_HT_TIME) WITH ROLLUP
